about_the_game:
In the late 19th centrury the american and canadian railroad companies were working on the expansion of their railroad network in the norther region of the Rocky Mountians. Driven by the enormous profits of the resources in these region, they spare no efforts and costs to lay tracks in these oulands. One result of these engagements are the railroad lines over Badgers Pass and Frinton Pass, that are serving the local wood industries and facilities.

Drive heavy loaded trains along the impressive landscape and keep the industries and their machineries at work... This route features an economic environment for delivering commodities to industries and customers.

Features:

- high detailed route
- many custom pbr objects
- American setting
- custom objects
- passenger and freight services
- more than 40 industry locations
- support for diesel, coal, Water, sand, funiture, logs, goods, woodchips, lumber and more
- economic environment with demand and supply
- 4 sessions included
detailed_description:
In the late 19th centrury the american and canadian railroad companies were working on the expansion of their railroad network in the norther region of the Rocky Mountians. Driven by the enormous profits of the resources in these region, they spare no efforts and costs to lay tracks in these oulands. One result of these engagements are the railroad lines over Badgers Pass and Frinton Pass, that are serving the local wood industries and facilities.

Drive heavy loaded trains along the impressive landscape and keep the industries and their machineries at work... This route features an economic environment for delivering commodities to industries and customers.

Features:

- high detailed route
- many custom pbr objects
- American setting
- custom objects
- passenger and freight services
- more than 40 industry locations
- support for diesel, coal, Water, sand, funiture, logs, goods, woodchips, lumber and more
- economic environment with demand and supply
- 4 sessions included

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.6
  • Processor: Intel i5 2Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Pro 555 with 1GB VRAM supporting OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 3GHz 64Bit Processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 430 or better/ AMD ATI 5550 or better
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Drive heavy loaded trains along the impressive landscape and keep the industries and their machineries at work across the Badgers Pass. This route features an economic environment for delivering commodities to industries and customers.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Czech, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese
